# Load central config
SCRIPT_DIR="$(cd "$(dirname "${BASH_SOURCE[0]}")" && pwd)"
source "$SCRIPT_DIR/config.sh"

# Colors
GREEN='\033[0;32m'
RED='\033[0;31m'
YELLOW='\033[1;33m'
CYAN='\033[0;36m'
NC='\033[0m'

print_header() {
  echo -e "${CYAN}=== RAG Debug Checker ===${NC}"
  echo -e "Project root: ${GREEN}$RAG_ROOT${NC}"
  echo
}
